subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
The non-proper noun usage of {{lang|zh|勣}} is [[:wikisource:zh:通用规范汉字表|officially eliminated]] in Mainland China (Use {{zh-l|绩}} instead). However, it can still be used in personal names in Mainland China; the corresponding simplified form of such usage is {{zh-l|𪟝}}.
* {{zh-x|@^傅.^懋勣[𪟝]{jì/‐jī}|{{w|Fu Maoji}}}}
